snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a study that shows that some mobile carriers are overcharging for data, where big technology money is going in the...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a study that shows that some mobile carriers are overcharging for data, where big technology money is going in the presidential campaign and a case that Apple's products are more complicated to use than they once were.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: H.P.'s Smartphone and Twitter's New Hacker
